Pre-Game Insights: Burkina Faso have never lost in the fixture before
Burkina Faso earned a point against Senegal with a stoppage-time equalizer
Malawi succumbed to a second consecutive defeat in all competition
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is for the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers
Both teams are aiming for their first win of the campaign
Others: The match will be played at the Stade du 26 Mars in neutral Mali
Malawi is ranked 126th in the world, while Burkina Faso is ranked 67th
